name: Pixels vs Mixels
description:
Pixels vs Mixels is an addictive tower defense game where you defend your base from an onslaught of cute and deadly creatures.
Choose your pixelated defenders wisely and strategically place them to stop the invading Mixels.
Upgrade your defenses and earn rewards to unlock new weapons and abilities. With multiple levels and challenges, you'll be entertained for hours.
Just like Plants vs Zombies, this game is easy to play but hard to put down.
Can you protect your base from the Mixels? Play now and find out!
